page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
We would like to say thank you to the following people: Mrs S Drew, who took us into the bell-tower of Lt. Waltham Church. Mr S Combes, who gave freely of his very valuable time and showed us much of Broomfield Hospital. Mr F Butler, who took us around a farm and then around Sparrowhawk Wood.
The following contributed work: A Baker, R Coleman, S Harvey, S Drew, J Campion, D Scott, N Beales, J Barry, C Marcus, V Nicholas,S Harvey, L Sprawling, P Vicary, J Bailey, F Bearman, T Titterton, A Coleman, E Boyce, M Burns, N Baker.
